channel.title: Asian-Cinema on IKMC
channel.description: Recent content in Asian-Cinema on IKMC

item.title: Spring, summer, fall, winter… and spring
item.description: I remember watching Spring, summer… one summer about eight years back on UTV world movies, and getting vaguely scarred by the image of a snake swimming around a boat on which monk is setting himself on fire. Not a good first impression, I agree. But time has flown past the handrails I held closely back then, and here I am, on a re-watch schedule of everything that got me curious at that age.
